mapper.update: update deliveryplace set mgID = #{mgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePName = #{dePName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceName = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityName = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mgName = #{mgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePTel = #{dePTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePAddr = #{dePAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dePID = #{dePID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dePID, mgID, dePName, provinceName, cityName, mgName, dePTel, dePAddr, Comment from deliveryplace
